description: Borrowed from Latin prūrītus (“itch, itching”), from prūriō (“itch”).

entries.meaning: (medicine) severe itching, especially of undamaged skin; caused by allergy, infection, lymphoma etc
examples: Atopic dermatitis, a chronic inflammatory skin disease, is characterized by skin erosion, oozing and crusting, redness, intense itching (pruritus) and dry skin.
